channel.title: Riverdale on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Riverdale on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: KJ Apa Didn’t Want to Be an Actor, But Wouldn’t Have It Any Other Way Now
item.description: With ‘Riverdale’ in his rearview mirror, the actor is now excited to be starring in movies, such as Prime Video’s ‘The Map That Leads to You,’ that he “wouldn’t have been able to imagine” before.

item.title: KJ Apa Didn’t Want to Be an Actor, But Wouldn’t Have It Any Other Way Now
item.description: With ‘Riverdale’ in his rearview mirror, the actor is now excited to be starring in movies, such as Prime Video’s ‘The Map That Leads to You,’ that he “wouldn’t have been able to imagine” before.

item.title: 30 Bingeworthy Young Adult Films and TV Shows Released in Recent Years
item.description: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty,’ ‘Never Have I Ever,’ ‘We Were Liars,’ ‘Elite’ and ‘My Fault: London’ are among popular projects that recently hit screens.
